amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 118-656 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to Congress any institution of higher education that has a relationship with a Confucius Institute or Chinese entity of concern and receives funds from the Department of Homeland Security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 118-656 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to report to Congress any institution of higher education that has a relationship with a Confucius Institute or Chinese entity of concern and receives funds from the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cline amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 151 (Roll no. 406).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cline amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 151 (Roll no. 406).
